name: redux-vcr
description: A Redux tool that records user sessions and allows them to be replayed. For debugging, QA, insights, and fun.

scripts.build:capture: cd capture && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:persist: cd persist && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:retrieve: cd retrieve && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:replay: cd replay && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:capture && npm run build:persist && npm run build:retrieve && npm run build:replay && npm run build:shared
scripts.test:capture: cd capture && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:persist: cd persist && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:retrieve: cd retrieve && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:replay: cd replay && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:shared: cd shared && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:all: npm run test:capture && npm run test:persist && npm run test:retrieve && npm run test:replay && npm run test:shared
scripts.install:all: npm run install:capture && npm run install:persist && npm run install:retrieve && npm run install:replay && npm run install:shared
scripts.publish:capture: cd capture && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:persist: cd persist && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:retrieve: cd retrieve && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:replay: cd replay && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:shared: cd shared && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:capture && npm run publish:persist && npm run publish:retrieve && npm run publish:replay && npm run publish:shared
